name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: *Pokemon Gengar* Bring the spooky charm of Gengar

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Step into the eerie world of Pokémon with the Pokemon Gengar live wallpaper. This hauntingly cool wallpaper

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Step into the eerie world of Pokémon with the "Pokemon Gengar" live wallpaper. This hauntingly cool wallpaper features the mischievous Gengar, known for its ghostly presence and playful antics. Watch as Gengar appears to come to life on your browser, creating a fun and spooky atmosphere for your tabs. Whether you're a Pokémon fan or just love a bit of mystery, this wallpaper will be the perfect addition to your browser.

**Key Features:**
- **Popular Website Shortcuts**: Quickly access your favorite websites with easy shortcuts built right into the wallpaper.
- **Date and Time Display**: Stay up-to-date with a sleek and functional clock and date display, adding practicality to the spooky design.

With its unique blend of eerie charm and functionality, this extension is perfect for Pokémon enthusiasts who want to add a little magic and mystery to their online experience. Download "Pokemon Gengar" today and let this ghostly creature enhance your browsing experience!
